definition: a judgment of the qualities of something or somebody, judge tentatively or form an estimate of (quantities or time)
details:
noun
- a judgment of the qualities of something or somebody
= example: a judgment of the qualities of something or somebody
= synonyms: estimation
- an approximate calculation of quantity or degree or worth
= example: an approximate calculation of quantity or degree or worth
= synonyms: approximation
- the respect with which a person is held
= synonyms: estimation
- a document appraising the value of something (as for insurance or taxation)
= synonyms: estimation, appraisal
- a statement indicating the likely cost of some job
= example: a statement indicating the likely cost of some job
verb
- judge tentatively or form an estimate of (quantities or time)
= example: judge tentatively or form an estimate of (quantities or time)
= synonyms: approximate, gauge, gage, judge, guess
- judge to be probable
= synonyms: figure
